pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, April 12, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, April 12, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will welcome Malala Yousafzai to Parliament.

Rotunda
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca

11:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Honorary Canadian Citizenship ceremony for Ms. Yousafzai and will deliver brief remarks.

Library of Parliament
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage only

12:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks in the House of Commons and will introduce Ms. Yousafzai.

House of Commons
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Ms. Yousafzai.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open photo opportunity
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Nova Scotia, Stephen McNeil.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open photo opportunity
